Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

void *

The basic type void * describes a standard C/C++ untyped memory pointer.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AILMALLOCCB, AIL_MIDI_to_XMI, AIL_compress_ADPCM, AIL_compress_ASI, AIL_compress_DLS, AIL_decompress_ADPCM, AIL_decompress_ASI, AIL_extract_DLS, AIL_file_fss_read, AIL_file_read, AIL_filter_DLS_with_XMI, AIL_find_DLS, AIL_mem_alloc_lock, AIL_mem_use_free, AIL_mem_use_malloc, AIL_merge_DLS_with_XMI, AIL_restore_stack, Register_RIB
Related Structures: AILSOUNDINFO, VDI_HDR
